fields.description:
Here is test failure:

        at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.web.JsonUtil.toRemoteException(JsonUtil.java:157)

        at org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.web.ByteRangeInputStream.read(ByteRangeInputStream.java:180)

        at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:93)

{code}

fields.summary: TestWebHDFS#testNamenodeRestart fails with NullPointerException in trunk

comments.body: This is actually due to a bug in the NN.  The http services are started before the image is loaded, the edits are processed, and the rpc server is started.  During image loading and edits processing, webhdfs will NPE on the rpc server.
HDFS-5857 has a patch for this issue. I am resolving this JIRA so that we have a single Jira tracking it
